name: Golmana
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The golmana makes two Claws attacks and one Tail attack. If both Claws attacks hit a Medium or smaller creature, the target is grappled (escape DC 15). Until this grapple ends, the target is restrained, and the golmana can't make Claws attacks against other targets.

actions.name: Claws
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 17 (3d8+4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Tail
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 13 (2d8+4) piercing damage.

actions.name: Void Screech (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The golmana lets out a keening screech in a 30-foot cone. Each creature that isn't a Fiend in that area must make a DC 15 CON save. On a failure, a creature takes 14 (4d6) necrotic damage and 18 (4d8) thunder damage, and it has disadvantage on the next attack roll it makes before the start of the golmana's next turn, as brief contact with the energies of the Void destabilizes the creature. On a success, a creature takes half the damage and doesn't suffer this disadvantage on its next attack roll.

special_abilities.name: Demonic Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The golmana is resistant to cold, fire, and lightning damage. In addition, it is immune to poison damage and to the poisoned condition.

special_abilities.name: Heightened Hearing
special_abilities.desc: The golmana's Perception is 19 when perceiving by hearing.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The golmana has advantage on saves against spells and other magical effects.

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb
special_abilities.desc: The golmana can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
